name: Shape Bully
description:
Welcome to Shape Bully,

where you and your typing skills deffend the poor circle against the bullying polygons...

Let me tell you the Keyfeatures:

-Compete in ONLINE Highscore

-Multilanguage

-Iconic Artstyle

WARNING: This game requires a active internet connection while starting a round and may could be highly addictive!

I wish you the best of Luck!

ps: If you want some new language to be addet or have any other input about improving ShapeBully feel free to Email me: kontakt@bp-softtech.de
